entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

On Sale. Original $ 4.99. Photo Eraser magically remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone and instantly fix your photos. Powered by the latest revolutionary photo InPaint algorithm, Photo Eraser performs the best among all other iPhone erasers that ruin your photos, including popular professional photo processing softwares. A variety of experiments shows the intelligent Photo Eraser will give you better and more natural, amazing results than any similar tools. Photo Eraser quickly remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone, including logo, text, data stamp, watermark, acnes, people... without any specialist knowledge and instantly fix the photos automatically as if they were never there. InPaint, improve and repair your photos. It targets to be a simple yet effective photo healing app for all iPhone users. Get the magical photos done in seconds-to-minutes instead of minutes-to-hours. People all over the world use Photo Eraser for iPhone every day to beautify their photos. Free download Eraser for iPhone today to be more creativity! Easy to get use & started. You only need mark unwanted area by red color, Photo Eraser for iPhone will make your photo much better in a minute. â€¨â€¨ Photo Eraser for iPhone features highlights: â€¨ âˆš Remove watermarks, date stamps and much more unwanted objects from photos for iPhone.â€¨ âˆš Delete unwanted people from photo for iPhone. â€¨ âˆš Erase text, signatures and other undated objects from photos for iPhone. â€¨ âˆš Make skin imperfections vanish for iPhone. â€¨ âˆš Completely non-technical. âˆš Support all iPhone device: iPhone 6s+, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6+, iPhone6, iPhone 5s, iPhone5c, iPhones 5, iPhones 4s, iPhone4, iPhone 3gsâ€¦ â€¢ Reviews by our users: - Works pretty well! by rfgf1 It does a fairly thorough job of removing things from the backgrounds of pictures, or objects that are not in the main focus of the original. Using the lasso and only straight lines and drawing a box around the object to be removed, is where I have seen my best results. - Amazing by Twon from VA Works great! I'm using a iPhone 6, IOS 8 Feedback: â€¨Any suggestion will be appreciated, support email: market@effectmatrix.com

  • Info Packï¼š14,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense! A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss. You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own. You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you, armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices. Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods, and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies. â—‡ 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills â—‡ The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild â—‡ Roguelike with random choices and opportunities

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 3D Pinball Space Cadet
entry.content:
Discount Information

Compras integradas

  • Remove Adsï¼š2,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 0,00Â â‚¬ [0,00Â â‚¬ ~ 2,99Â â‚¬]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š3,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • Remove Adsï¼š0,00Â â‚¬

Application Description

The table features the player as a member of a space fleet that completes missions to increase rank. Players can attain nine different ranks (listed from lowest to highest): Cadet, Ensign, Lieutenant, Captain, LT Commander, Commander, Commodore, Admiral, and Fleet Admiral. Players accept a mission by hitting "mission targets" which select which mission they will take, and by going up the "launch ramp". Each mission has a set number of things for players to do, such as hitting the "attack bumpers" (which are a set of four bumpers at the top of the table) eight times (this is the "target practice" mission). Some missions involve a number of steps which must be completed in sequence. Missions end either by being completed, or by being aborted due to running out of "fuel", as indicated by the lights in the passage that passes under the launch ramp. The "fuel" lights go out one by one at a time interval, and can be re-lit by having the ball go over them, or all at once by going up the launch ramp again. Upon completing a mission, some of the blue lights in a circle in the middle of the table turn on. When all of the lights in the blue circle turn on, the player's rank increases, and a light in the orange circle turns on.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Queime borracha e destrua metal no maior circuito de corrida livre que hÃ¡! Wreckfest possui uma paulada de opÃ§Ãµes de melhorias e personalizaÃ§Ãµes. VocÃª pode se preparar para a prÃ³xima corrida de demoliÃ§Ã£o com para-choques reforÃ§ados, santantÃ´nios, protetores laterais e muito mais, ou pode preparar o carro para uma Corrida Lata Velha com peÃ§as de desempenho de motor como filtros de ar, Ã¡rvores de cames, sistemas de combustÃ­vel etc. Wreckfest estÃ¡ se tornando o melhor jogo de combate motorizado que existe. â€¢ ExperiÃªncia de Corrida Ãšnica - Corridas de aÃ§Ã£o sem regras e de tirar o fÃ´lego, com momentos Ãºnicos possÃ­veis apenas graÃ§as Ã  simulaÃ§Ã£o fÃ­sica realista. Participe de batalhas em circuitos de alta velocidade, enfrente a possibilidade de destruiÃ§Ã£o total em rotas malucas com intersecÃ§Ãµes e trÃ¡fego ou parta para a dominaÃ§Ã£o nas arenas de destruiÃ§Ã£o. â€¢ Carros IncrÃ­veis - Nossos carros sÃ£o velhos, acabados e remendados, mas cheios de estilo! Dos velhos guerreiros americanos aos Ã¡geis europeus, passando pelos asiÃ¡ticos divertidos! NÃ£o tem nada como isso em outros jogos. â€¢ PersonalizaÃ§Ã£o Relevante - Altere nÃ£o sÃ³ a aparÃªncia do carro, mas tambÃ©m a blindagem. Reforce-os com placas de ferro pesadas que protegem contra dano, mas aumentam o peso, impactando o controle. Modifique o carro para que se torne um tanque robusto, um foguete frÃ¡gil e veloz ou qualquer coisa entre esses extremos! â€¢ Multijogador - Destrua seus amigos no modo multijogador local e corra no limite enquanto os persegue para dominar na demoliÃ§Ã£o! â€¢ Modos Desafiadores - Divirta-se com colheitadeiras, cortadores de grama, Ã´nibus escolares, triciclos e muito mais! â€¢ Modo Carreira - Batalhe em campeonatos, ganhe experiÃªncia, desbloqueie novas melhorias e carros e torne-se o campeÃ£o mÃ¡ximo de Wreckfest! Â© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Description

*Confira se o seu dispositivo Ã© suportado antes de jogar Subnautica!* Subnautica Ã© um jogo de aventura subaquÃ¡tica ambientado em um planeta oceÃ¢nico alienÃ­gena. Um mundo aberto enorme repleto de maravilhas e perigos estÃ¡ Ã  sua espera! Mergulhe nas profundezas, fabrique equipamentos, pilote submarinos e supere a vida selvagem para explorar recifes de corais, vulcÃµes, sistemas de cavernas e muito mais â€” tudo enquanto tenta sobreviver. Desvende o mistÃ©rio deste mundo repleto de criaturas, tanto amigÃ¡veis quanto hostis, com pistas de uma era passada. Jogue no modo de sobrevivÃªncia e vivencie o desafio original ou troque para o modo de liberdade ou criativo para explorar o planeta oceÃ¢nico sem a pressÃ£o da sede, da fome ou do oxigÃªnio. RECURSOS â€¢ SOBREVIVA â€” ApÃ³s cair em um vasto planeta subaquÃ¡tico, vocÃª corre contra o tempo para encontrar comida, Ã¡gua e para desenvolver os equipamentos necessÃ¡rios para explorar. â€¢ EXPLORE â€” Gerencie fome, sede e fornecimento de oxigÃªnio conforme mergulha nas enormes florestas de alga, nos planaltos iluminados pelo sol, nos recifes bioluminescentes e sistemas de caverna enormes. â€¢ SUCATEIE â€” Colete recursos do oceano Ã  sua volta. Aventure-se ainda mais nas profundezas para encontrar recursos mais raros, permitindo a fabricaÃ§Ã£o de itens avanÃ§ados. â€¢ FABRIQUE â€” Crie bases para se abrigar, veÃ­culos para pilotar, ferramentas de sobrevivÃªncia para auxiliar na navegaÃ§Ã£o e na adaptaÃ§Ã£o a este cenÃ¡rio subaquÃ¡tico. â€¢ DESCUBRA â€” O que aconteceu com o planeta? O que causou o seu acidente? VocÃª consegue achar uma saÃ­da deste planeta sem morrer? â€¢ PERSONALIZE â€” Jogue no modo de sobrevivÃªncia e vivencie o desafio original ou troque para o modo de liberdade ou criativo para explorar o planeta oceÃ¢nico sem a pressÃ£o da sede, da fome ou do oxigÃªnio. CUIDADOSAMENTE REPROJETADO PARA DISPOSITIVOS MÃ“VEIS â€¢ Interface reformulada â€” IU mÃ³vel exclusiva com controle de toque completo â€¢ Conquistas do Game Center â€¢ Salvamento na nuvem â€” compartilhe o progresso entre dispositivos iOS â€¢ CompatÃ­vel com controles MFi â€¢ OtimizaÃ§Ã£o para iPhone 16 (incluindo Pro Max) ----- *DISPOSITIVOS INCOMPATÃVEIS (O jogo nÃ£o funciona)* : - iPhone Xr, iPhone SE Gen 2 (2020) - iPad Mini Gen 5, iPad Air Gen 3, iPad Gen 8, iPad Gen 9 *DISPOSITIVOS COMPATÃVEIS APENAS EM BAIXA RESOLUÃ‡ÃƒO* : - iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Mini, iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Mini, iPhone SE Gen 3 (2022) - iPad Pro 10.5"", iPad Mini Gen 6, iPad Air Gen 4, iPad Gen 10, iPad Pro 11"" Gen 1, iPad Pro 12.9"" Gen 3 *DISPOSITIVOS COMPATÃVEIS* : - iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 14 E ACIMA - iPad Pro 11"" Gen 2, iPad Pro 12.9"" Gen 4, iPad Air Gen 5, iPad Pro 11"" Gen 3, iPad Pro 11"" Gen 4, iPad Pro 12.9"" Gen 5, iPad Pro 12.9"" Gen 6 E ACIMA

entry.title: Chord
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬ â†’ Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 2,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Application Description

This app plus your ears equals complete freedom in writing music! A comprehensive set of tools for any musician: * Chord Progression: Create beautiful chord progressions with full flexibility - use inversions, sus2, sus4, 7th, 9th, and more. Enjoy live playback as piano or synth, or send MIDI directly to your macOS computer! * MIDI Keyboard: Transform your phone into a MIDI keyboard for your macOS computer (compatible with macOS Catalina and newer). * Notation Practice: Practice reading notes in both treble and bass clefs. * Chord Calculation: Help you learn how to calculate chords and progressions. * Interval Practice: Practice recognizing and comparing musical intervals by ear. * Voice & Ear Training: Simple, effective tools for voice practice and ear training. * Harmonic Match - helps you mix tracks in key while DJing. Plus, enjoy the macOS version included with your purchase!

iPad
